text: Timiharu aphano muhara purva ra pascimatarpha gardaima kunai punyakarya chaina, apitu asala dharmi tyo ho jasale allaha, kayamata, pharistaharu, allahako kitaba ra paigambaraharumathi astha rakhdachan, ra jasale sampati pratiko mayako bavajuda (tyasabata) natedara, anatha, nihsahaya, yatru ra bhikhariharula'i pradana gardacha ra dasaharula'i mukta gara'unama kharca gardacha, ra niyamita namaja padhadcha ra jakata dincha, ra di'eko vacana pura gardacha. Garibi duhkha ra yud'dhako bela dhairya rakhdacha. Yinai sacca ra asala manisaharu hun
